title: Bug 21706 - BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
description: Bug 21706 - BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
OB: The BidiUtil class in the org.eclipse.swt.internal package has a line that uses the Class.forName() method to create a new instance of the Callback class. The BidiUtil.class is a syntactic sugar for Class.forName("org.eclipse.swt.internal.BidiUtil").
EB: The usage of Class.forName() in the BidiUtil class in win32 should be removed to avoid a NoClassDefFoundError in the CLDC version of SWT. The reflection in this line can be replaced with a direct class instantiation.
SR: Modify the BidiUtil class in win32 to replace the usage of Class.forName() with a direct class instantiation to prevent a NoClassDefFoundError in the CLDC version of SWT.
